com.jmr.wrapper.common.sql

Interface IDatabase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JDBCDatabase

    public interface IDatabase
    Networking Library IDatabase.java Purpose: Framework for a database driver to implement. Used in the already implemented JDBCDatabase class which uses the JDBC driver.
    Version:
    1.0 7/19/2014
    Author:
    Jon R (Baseball435)

    • Method Detail

      • executeQuery

        java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String query)
                                throws NNDatabaseQueryError
        Executes a query.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to execute.
        Returns:
        The ResultSet that holds the returned information.
        Throws:
        NNDatabaseQueryError - Thrown when the query can't be ran.

      • executeQuery

        java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.sql.Statement statement,
                              java.lang.String query)
                                throws NNDatabaseQueryError
        Executes a query.
        Parameters:
        statement - An already instantiated statement to perform the query on.
        query - The query to execute.
        Returns:
        The ResultSet that holds the returned information.
        Throws:
        NNDatabaseQueryError - Thrown when the query can't be ran.

      • executeUpdate

        int executeUpdate(java.lang.String query)
                  throws NNDatabaseQueryError
        Executes a query which can only be an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE query.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to execute.
        Returns:
        The count of the affected rows. 0 is nothing was effected.
        Throws:
        NNDatabaseQueryError - Thrown when the query can't be ran.

      • executeUpdate

        int executeUpdate(java.sql.Statement st,

                  throws NNDatabaseQueryError
        Executes a query which can only be an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE query.
        Parameters:
        statement - An already instantiated statement to perform the query on.
        query - The query to execute.
        Returns:
        The count of the affected rows. 0 is nothing was effected.
        Throws:
        NNDatabaseQueryError - Thrown when the query can't be ran.

      • executeUpdate

        int executeUpdate(java.sql.PreparedStatement st)
                  throws NNDatabaseQueryError
        Executes a query which can only be an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE query.
        Parameters:
        statement - An already instantiated prepared statement to execute.
        Returns:
        The count of the affected rows. 0 is nothing was effected.
        Throws:
        NNDatabaseQueryError - Thrown when the query can't be ran.

      • executeQuery

        java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.sql.PreparedStatement st)
                                throws NNDatabaseQueryError
        Executes a query from a prepared statement.
        Parameters:
        statement - An already instantiated prepared statement to execute.
        Returns:
        The ResultSet that holds the returned database information
        Throws:
        NNDatabaseQueryError - Thrown when the query can't be ran.

      • getPreparedStatement

        java.sql.PreparedStatement getPreparedStatement(java.lang.String query)
                                                throws NNDatabaseQueryError
        Creates a prepared statement from a query. Used to stop SQL injection.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to perform.
        Returns:
        The prepared statement.
        Throws:
        NNDatabaseQueryError

      • getRowCount

        int getRowCount(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                throws NNDatabaseQueryError
        Returns the amount of rows of a ResultSet.
        Parameters:
        rs - The ResultSet object to check.
        Returns:
        The amount of rows.
        Throws:
        NNDatabaseQueryError - Thrown when query can't be run.

                                   throws NNDatabaseQueryError
